DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare efficacy Biodesign™ Surgisis® Tissue Graft reinforce overlap sphincter repair versus standard overlap sphincter repair control episode incontinence patient fecal incontinence defect anal sphincter .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Efficacy Biological Implant Reinforce Overlapping Sphincter Repair Versus Overlapping Sphincter Repair Alone
DOC.criteria: Female Age 18 year old fecal incontinence due anterior defect external anal sphincter external internal anal sphincter muscle Fecal incontinence severity score 10 Fecal incontinence episodes 4 2 week period History diabetes History allergy porcine derivative History infection anal area ( abscess , fistula ) History inflammatory bowel disease History hidradenitis suppurativa History immunosuppression History HIV positivity History radiation study site within last 12 month Patients travel keep follow appointment Patients prisoner Patients mentally handicap Patients pregnant plan become pregnant study period , currently breastfeed Patients significant posterior pelvic organ prolapse would candidate concomitant treatment . Patients FIQL baseline score ≤ 4 Patients participate another clinical trial indication Patients unwilling give inform consent
